core_identity.name: Crystal Caverns
core_identity.description: A network of caves in the mountainside east of Emberhold, illuminated by naturally phosphorescent crystals
core_identity.purpose: Source of rare elemental crystals including the Ember Crystal
core_identity.history: Discovered by the founders of Emberhold, who found the first Ember Crystal here

districts.name: Entrance Cavern
districts.description: The first large chamber when entering from the path to Emberhold

districts.name: Crystal Growth Chamber
districts.description: A large cavern where most of the crystals form naturally

notable_features.name: Crystal Formations
notable_features.description: Veins of various minerals run through the walls, and crystal formations of different colors and sizes grow from the ceiling and floor.

districts.name: Deep Caverns
districts.description: The deepest accessible part of the cave system

notable_features.name: Ancient Altar
notable_features.description: A stone platform at the deepest part of the accessible caverns, seemingly crafted for ritual purposes. Runes similar to those at the forge are carved into its surface.

notable_features.name: Ember Geode
notable_features.description: A cracked formation where the Ember Crystal was originally discovered generations ago. Faint traces of heat still emanate from the opening.
